Allen was born in Lombard Illinois.


 He attended kindergarten at Long school on Forster Avenue followed by grades 1 - 3 at St. Cornilius. His parents moved from Foster Ave to Kedzie Ave and he attended grades 4 and 5 at St. Veronica School just a few blocks away.  When Allen was 12 his parents moved to Maywood where he attanded Roosevelt Elementary School for grades 6 thru 8 then attended Provise East High School.
